name: Blockman GO: Blocky Mods
description:
Communicate with players from all over the world in Blockman Go. It is a good choice for making friends and holding a party with your friends.

Multiplayer Games and Global Service
- Globalization, play with friends from all over the world.
- Challenging mode, work with other players to finish the tasks!
- Beats other teams to achieve higher achievements with your team.
- Support 50 players in a game at the same time. That's the best chance to get to know new friends.

Multiple online modes and richer gaming experience
- Egg War Mode
- Bed War Mode
- Parkour Mode
- Hidden and Seek Mode
......

Compete with other players in multiple modes and become the finally winner！ Variety of game modes, Shooting, fighting, racing, casual games...

Download Blockman Go and play with your friends now!

If you have any feedback and suggestion, please feel free to contact us at blockymods@sandboxol.com
Discord ：https://discord.gg/PsVMjUk
Official website : https://www.blockmango.net

DISCLAIMER-This is a third party App, it is not the game Minecraft or affiliated with the game and its makers (Mojang or Microsoft) in anyway.
